page.title: 06Religion in Newborough-cont.
page.content: Other reasons were,"Don't think it's needed",and,"I pray at home". Both village schools are Church of England and both also provide a Sunday school.Newborough school has a Sunshine group for children which is mainly learning about the Bible. Each month,Brownies,Cubs and Scouts have a parade at Newborough church. Instead of old fashioned church bells Newborough church has modern loud speakers with pre-recorded bell tolls for services.At Christmas time the loud speakers play carols around Newborough all Christmas eve.The church yard is being renovated,grave stones being straightened,shrubs being pruned and lawns renewed. The vicar died a few months ago.The new vicar is young and the villagers expect change.
